title: Karyotypic stasis and its implications for extensive hybridization events in corallivores species of butterflyfishes (Chaetodontidae)
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Wagner Franco Molina, Sudarat Khensuwan, Renata Luiza Rosa de Moraes, Francisco de Menezes Cavalcante Sassi, Gideão Wagner Werneck Félix da Costa, Davi Zalder Miguel, Weerayuth Supiwong, Sitthisak Jantarat, Krit Phintong, Kriengkrai Seetapan, Sukhonthip Ditcharoen, Alongklod Tanomtong, Thomas Liehr, Marcelo de Bello Cioffi
